name: Interstellar Marines: Prologue
blurb: Immersive AAA-quality Indie FPS with RPG elements, tactical co-op & nonlinear gameplay set in a believable future.

rewards.reward: EARLY BACKER: Receive THE GAME tier below at an \u201cearly bird\u201d price!

THE GAME: You receive Prologue on STEAM and as a DOWNLOADABLE DRM-free version when it is finished. You also receive an exclusive BACKER RIBBON on your game identity that proves you made Prologue happen!

OPEN DOOR DEVELOPMENT: Everything from above + You are assigned the VANGUARD GAME IDENTITY that grants Open Door Development access to Prologue all the way to its completion. It also gets your name in the CREDITS!
PROLOGUE CO-OP PACK: Everything from above + You receive 3 EXTRA copies of Prologue to give to your friends and experience Prologue in all it\u2019s co-op glory!

FIRST CONTACT: Everything from above + You receive the DIGITAL ART BOOK filled with concept art, renderings and illustrations from the development of Prologue, as well as the DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK \u201cThe Beginning\u201d. You are also assigned a FRONTLINER GAME IDENTITY as a true visionary for what is to come, that includes a digital pre-order of the first game of the trilogy called First Contact!
FIRST CONTACT CO-OP PACK: Everything from above + You receive 3 EXTRA digital pre-orders of First Contact to give to your friends.
DIGITAL-ONLY TRILOGY: This tier is identical to the TRILOGY tier below, but without the backer t-shirt.

TRILOGY: Everything from above + You are assigned the SPEARHEAD GAME IDENTITY that includes a digital pre-order of the COMPLETE TRILOGY in all its glory, including your name in the credits and HALL OF FAME rooms in all games. You also receive an exclusive backer T-SHIRT that shows \u201cWe Are Not Alone!\u201d (Free shipping worldwide)
TRILOGY CO-OP PACK: Everything from above + The First Contact Co-Op Pack is upgraded to the complete trilogy, so you will be ready to play the entire game series with your co-op buddies!

CLAIM YOUR BULLSEYE: Everything from above + You reserve a LIMITED SPOT to get your name on a unique bullseye in Prologue that ties into the achievement mini-game. You will also receive a physical BULLSEYE PIN to go with your t-shirt. (You must select this tier to claim this reward!)

IN-GAME HELMET & EXTRA T-SHIRT: Everything from above (except \u201cClaim Your Bullseye\u201d) + At this tier you are a SUPER SUPPORTER so you receive an exclusive in-game helmet only wearable by Super Supporters and another backer t-shirt. You also receive a Super Supporter RIBBON on your Spearhead game identity and are placed under the Super Supporters section of the credits and Hall of Fame rooms! (Free shipping worldwide)
DIGITAL-ONLY CO-OP PACK: This tier is identical to the SIGNED POSTER & CO-OP PACK tier below, but without the poster and backer t-shirts.

SIGNED POSTER & CO-OP PACK: Everything from above + You receive an exclusive movie-size poster signed by the team and a  Vanguard Co-Op Pack to gift among your friends. You will also receive 2 EXTRA T-SHIRTS so there will be one for each of your buddies! (Free shipping worldwide)

SIGNED ART BOOK: Everything from above + You receive a signed hardcover art book with full-page concept art, renderings and illustrations about the development of Prologue. Your co-op pack from above is also bumped to a FRONTLINER CO-OP PACK so you can gift both Prologue and the first game of the trilogy, to your co-op buddies! (Free shipping worldwide)

LIFETIME ACCESS: Everything from above + At this tier we believe you have contributed more than enough, so we will award you with LIFETIME ACCESS TO INTERSTELLAR MARINES on all platforms! You will also be upgraded to the SPEARHEAD CO-OP PACK so you can experience the complete trilogy in co-op with your friends. Finally we want to salute your support by sending you a CUSTOM-MADE ITO DOG TAG engraved with your username! (Free shipping worldwide)

COLLECTIBLE STATUE & SARA ANNOUNCEMENT: Everything from above + You receive a physical one of a kind collectible marine statue that ties into the \u201cfind the collectible statues\u201d MINI-GAME! You will also be given the unique chance to collaborate with the team and DESIGN A SARA ANNOUNCEMENT. At this tier you will also reserve a spot in the CLAIM YOUR BULLSEYE mini-game. (Free shipping worldwide)

IN-GAME SHRINE: Everything from above + We will construct and place a shrine of you in Prologue to commemorate your enormous support for all eternity! You will also receive a POSTER OF YOUR SHRINE signed by the artist. (Free shipping worldwide)

DESIGN WEAPON & MEET THE TEAM: Everything from above + You are given a unique chance to collaborate with the team in designing a weapon for Prologue! You are also invited to our humble offices in Copenhagen, Denmark to meet and hangout with the team and, based on your preferences, we will arrange for a fun and exciting VIP treatment at our expense. (Travel and lodging not included)
